name: Tax-Exempt Reserve Income Tests
description: Tests for tax-exempt reserve income with pensionable election (TD1 form field)

test_cases.description: Ontario $60k with tax-exempt reserve income $300 (not pensionable)
test_cases.notes: Tax-exempt reserve income (military/RCMP) - NOT pensionable. CPP based on 2007.69 earnings (2307.69 - 300). Provincial claim adjusted to 12989.00 (CRA minimum).

test_cases.description: Ontario $60k with tax-exempt reserve income $300 (pensionable elected)
test_cases.notes: Tax-exempt reserve income elected as pensionable for CPP. CPP based on full 2307.69 earnings. Provincial claim adjusted to 12989.00 (CRA minimum).
